name: Slack Notification Sensor
description: Monitor Slack channels for new messages and trigger jobs based on keywords or users
author: Dagster Community

slack_token.label: Slack Bot Token
slack_token.description: Slack Bot User OAuth token (use ${SLACK_TOKEN} for env var)

channel_id.label: Channel ID
channel_id.description: Slack channel ID to monitor (e.g., C1234567890)

job_name.label: Job to Trigger
job_name.description: Name of the job to run when matching messages are found

keyword_filter.label: Keyword Filter
keyword_filter.description: Only trigger on messages containing this keyword (leave empty for all messages)

user_filter.label: User Filter
user_filter.description: Only trigger on messages from this Slack user ID (leave empty for all users)

minimum_interval_seconds.label: Check Interval (seconds)
minimum_interval_seconds.description: How often to check for new messages
